values.materials: Woods, metal alloys, leather and various materials.

values.dimensions: case length 50.5 cm, Width 63.7 cm, Total height 112.2 cm

cutups and block dimensions of wood pipes and cutups and inside diameters of metal pipes are as follows:

4' Coppel                                 2' Holzprinzipal                               1' Octav

C       12    50 x 45                   12       47 x 41                                 *6       *25
c        10    33 x 28.5                 7.5     33 x 25                                 *4       *16
c'        *6    21 x 18                    4         15 x 11                                 *3       *10
c''         5    15 x 13                    3          9.5 x 7                                   2.8       9
c'''        2       9 x 8                      2           6 x 5                                     1.8       6

*estimated;  original pipe altered or missing metal pipes appear to have a low lead content;  material has been scraped, and the note names written near the seam;  languids are thin and have vertical front edges;  mouth width probably near 2/9 pipe circumference;  1/3 of original metal pipes are replacements, including the first three c's; the Octav breaks to 2' and c'';  bellows, chest, and many pipes original.
